title: Content (modules)

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: This feature could be use to add direct link to the section. You need to define the section ID (without any space or special characters, must be unique on a page), then you could create a direct link to this section with : /url-of-the-page#section-id
